name: slumlord
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who rents out houses and flats that are in poor areas and in poor condition, often charging unfairly high rents: The mayor said he was pleased with the progress the District has made in compelling slumlords to improve substandard living conditions. The goal is to find a way to protect tenants from slumlords, and property managers from bad tenants.
